title: Self-Generated Questions Overview
body: This course overviews to the Self-Generated Questions strategy

title: Self-Generated Questions Level 1
body: This course demonstrates how to teach students to self-generate Level 1 or Right There questions.

title: Self-Generated Questions Level 2
body: This course demonstrates how to teach students to self-generate Level 2 or Putting It Together questions.

title: Self-Generated Questions Level 3
body: This course demonstrates how to teach students to self-generate Level 3 or Making Connections questions.

title: Level 1 â€” Level 3 & Differentiation
body: This course reviews the Self-Generated Questions (SGQs) strategy and introduces tips for differentiation.
